entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.7.5
entry.content:

  • Don't use enum for ollama / Ollama default url / Try to get category â€¦ by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/137

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.7.6 Fix typo
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.1.4 to 1.1.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/140
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.21.0 to 8.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/144
  • Bump @types/node from 22.10.10 to 22.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/143
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.1.4 to 1.1.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/141
  • Bump @ai-sdk/anthropic from 1.1.4 to 1.1.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/142
  • Fix google env variable names by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/146

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.7.5...1.7.6

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.7.7 bump actual api version
New release for Actual AI: 1.7.8 - Support Actual 25.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump ai from 4.1.7 to 4.1.28 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/151
  • Bump @actual-app/api from 25.2.0 to 25.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/150
  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.1.8 to 1.1.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/149
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.21.0 to 8.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/148
  • Bump @types/node from 22.13.0 to 22.13.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/147
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.22.0 to 8.24.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/160
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.23.0 to 8.25.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/164
  • Bump @actual-app/api from 25.2.1 to 25.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/175

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.7.7...1.7.8

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for Groq and other improvements by @kevingatera in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/162

New Contributors

  • @kevingatera made their first contribution in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/162

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.7.8...1.8.0
